metadata.name: Lost & Found
metadata.description:
The first artwork of the "Inner palette" series describes the process of a new meeting with disintegrated parts of our personalities. Sometimes to become a whole person, we need to path a long way with struggles, frustrations, separations, and depression. 

Through dancing, visual and sound art, we want to immerse the viewers into the inner world and find TRUE yourselves. It might be an exciting journey into those coordinates of reality in which you want to be.
Created by an international team using a "Reverse" idea in choreography and sound to emphasize the moment where past and present intersect. 

Collectors will be provided with the high-quality version of the video: 2764x3456 (4K), HDR

Choreography: Irina Angles
Video Artist: Alessio Dispenza (backinasec)
Cinematographer: Anton Kolomiiets
Sound artist: FAAF
